name: The Swarm of the Slimes
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 Jam. 

The Theme was "Stronger Together".

The way my game fits the theme is that your enemies, who are the slimes, can merge together and become stronger and stronger. 

Controls: WASD to move, left click to shoot, scroll wheel to change weapons.

Notes: 

  • The smallest slimes won't hurt you
  • In the shop, slime balls are equivalent to $
  • To buy and equip an item, you have to first have the necessary funds, and then you have to both buy and equip it.

Thanks for playing!!!
